description:
Erection of new freestanding pole sign and installation of new fascia signs 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  5152.00.01, .02., .03, .04,                         GEN.00.01, .02, .03, .04, .05, .06,                         .07, .08, .09, .10, .11, .12 and                         site location plan
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposals would give rise to a serious over- proliferation of advertisements in the immediate vicinity and the general locality, resulting in advertisements that would be dominant, discordant and intrusive features in the streetscene and have an adverse impact on the visual amenities of the area generally, that would neither preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the Angel Conservation Area or the setting of the adjacent Listed Buildings, contrary to Policies D1 and ENV9 of the Unitary Development Plan and the Council's Conservation Area Design Guidelines.
